.. _trpo:


TRPO
==========

Base Knowledge
----------------

:math:`\alpha > \beta`

Display 公式:

.. math::

    n_{\mathrm{offset}} = \sum_{k=0}^{N-1} s_k n_k



多行公式:

.. math::

   (a + b)^2 = a^2 + 2ab + b^2

   (a - b)^2 = a^2 - 2ab + b^2

对齐多行公式:

.. math::

   (a + b)^2  &=  (a + b)(a + b) \\
              &=  a^2 + 2ab + b^2
